title: I need help
body:
So my team and the enemy team both got randomly disconnected in game and it kicked us out, the match isn't in our match history. It still shows that we are ingame

https://prnt.sc/g2n2fp

http://prntscr.com/g2n4sz

replies.body: It sounds like that game may have had some kind of critical error and ended up crashing entirely. It's pretty rare, but when that happens everyone will be booted from the game, won't be hit with any penalties, and you'll be able to re-queue as normal.
